ygData.subject: RE: Harmonic's Distorted view of Dragon Raids (and some P.S.'s for Sylly)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe - thanks!  I now have the honor of being in and having been in 2 of the very best guilds on Innoruuk.  SotM and TP are incredibly similar in the way they
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe - thanks! I now have the honor of being in and having been in 2 of the
very best guilds on Innoruuk. SotM and TP are incredibly similar in the way
they have developed a real 'family' feeling. There are some really fine
people in both guilds and I am really lucky to know them all. For those of
you who have not guilded, I strongly recommend that you try it. And there
is no greater feeling in the world (game) than to go into a Dragon Lair with
full confidence in your team. Win or lose - live or die - the feeling of
being on a great family team is the best.

If you need an extra bard... hehe let me know! I'd be glad to tag along for
fun! Silvera is my heroeinne from a long time ago so I got a lot of respect
for you guys!!

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bard of the 40th song
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. double yak-attack now ;p - costly though - thank the gods for lev 50
rezz's


-----Original Message-----
From: Miriana [mailto:miriana@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 8:54 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Harmonic's Distorted view of Dragon Raids (and
some P.S.'s for Sylly)

Sorry, I couldn't resist the pun on your last name Harmonic :P.

P.S. Sylly! You're in Pantheon now, I didn't even notice :P. Congrats,
Gallenite and Archi are great people :).

P.P.S. Yeah Sylly, we got both Naggy and Vox yesterday, but both are back.
Tonight's plan is Naggy again, and we have an agreement with someone else
(I have no clue whom, was worked out by my guild leader) to let them get a
couple of days to try Vox with. If they fail, we'll kill Vox this
weekend.

P.P.P.S. The only reason we put pressure on ML and Storm to yield to us
was because one of our members was bound on the pedestal where Vox sits
from a previous Vox killing and gated back without remembering to rebind.
Hence, getting him back was a high priority of ours.

Miriana
Level 50 Cleric
Kalera
Level 35 Bard
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
